pullRequest.title: Update some of the Python dependencies from Beam Dependency Check Report
pullRequest.bodyText:
Dependencies updated:

fastavro
cachetools
oauth2client


Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

nodes.bodyText: What is the context for this change (do you by chance have a pertaining fastavro commit that changes this behavior)?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -627,11 +627,19 @@ def write_record(self, writer, value):
     writer.append(value)
 
 
+class _FastAvroWriter(Writer):
+  """An adapter class which exposes a file handle so that it can be closed
+  by the sink. """
+  def __init__(self, file_handle, schema, codec):
+    super(_FastAvroWriter, self).__init__(file_handle, schema, codec)

nodes.bodyText: Do we need to increase the lower bound (is the change not compatible with earlier fastavro releases)?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -141,7 +141,7 @@ def get_version():
     # server, therefore list of allowed versions is very narrow.
     # See: https://github.com/uqfoundation/dill/issues/341.
     'dill>=0.3.1.1,<0.3.2',
-    'fastavro>=0.21.4,<0.24',
+    'fastavro>=1.0.0,<2',

commit.message: fix: don't increase the lower bound for fastavro
